The Natural Capital Project: a new approach
The Natural Capital Project:
a new approach

Project Goals:
Project Goals:

• Make conservation mainstream and economically attractive
• Make conservation mainstream and economically
attractive

• Incorporate multiple ecosystem services into natural resource decisions
• Incorporate multiple ecosystem services into natural
resource decisions

• Change the way ecosystems are utilized by integrating environmental systems, economic benefits and human well-being

environmental systems, economic benefits and human
well-being

• Provide information, examples and tools to make that easy

easy
